price: Akasema: Hakika mimi ni katika wanao kichukia hichi kitendo chenu.
footnotes: Lut'i akasema: Hakika mimi nakichukia mno hichi kitendo chenu, wala sitoacha kabisa kukipinga na kukikebehi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
